show_name: Bodacious Space Pirates The Movie: Abyss of Hyperspace
other_title: Mōretsu Pirates: Abyss of Hyperspace - Akū no Shinen (Japanese)
モーレツ宇宙海賊 ABYSS OF HYPERSPACE -亜空の深淵- (Japanese)
plot: Kanata Mugen is the son of a famous space explorer. With the help of a Galaxy Pass, a robot parrot and the crew of the Bentenmaru (among others from the TV series), he is trying to locate the will and the direction to his destiny.
opening_theme: "Mōretsu Uchū Kōkyōkyoku - Dai-Shichi Gakushō 'Mugen no Ai'" (猛烈宇宙交響曲・第七楽章「無限の愛」; "Extreme Space Symphony's Movement VII 'Infinite Love'") by Momoiro Clover Z
ending_theme: "Kirakira-go-round" (キラキラ-go-round; Sparkling-go-round) by Angela and Shoko Nakagawa
